description:
A modern file manager for Windows 10 and Windows 11.

OneCommander is a modern file manager for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Features include tabs, dual-pane browsers, columns navigation, built-in preview, a theming system, color tags, and much more. It is free for home use and has no ads.
🛠️ Prevents holding backspace to clear filter from opening parent folder after filter is cleared
🐞 Fixed issue with OneDrive thumbnails
🐞 Fixed issue with restarting Google Drive
🐞 Fixed issue scrolling to item at the edge of the list when item is clicked
🐞 Fixed address-bar dropdown not scrolling all the way when using cursor keys
